statements: DELETE FROM student_projects WHERE student_id = 100 AND submission_date < '2022-01-01';
DELETE FROM student_projects WHERE student_id = 101 AND submission_date < '2022-10-01';
DELETE FROM students WHERE student_name = 'Alice Smith';
DELETE FROM ResearchPapers WHERE paper_author = 'John Smith';
DELETE FROM Assessments WHERE score < 60 AND assessment_id = '3f5f0a9e-872a-4c23-a6eb-7c582c40a17a';
DELETE FROM Projects WHERE student_id = 'e973c53e-d3fe-45ca-98c6-23bd9c55c1e5' OR project_id = '90a9fcff-76a7-42b1-8c69-aa53d665ffcb';
